metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2570 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: The Edge Side Includes (ESI) parser in Squid 3.x before 3.5.15 and 4.x before 4.0.7 does not check buffer limits during XML parsing, which allows remote HTTP servers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and daemon exit) via a crafted XML document, related to esi/CustomParser.cc and esi/CustomParser.h.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> needs substantial backporting There are no current plans to fix this CVE in Ubuntu 12.04 LTS and Ubuntu 14.04 LTS.

criterions.comment: squid3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
